forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
